mapper.select: SELECT CERTI_NO, RESUME_NO, CERTI_KINDS, CERTI_NAME, CERTI_PLACE, ACCEPT, CERTI_DATE FROM CERTIFICATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CERTIFICATE(CERTI_NO, RESUME_NO, CERTI_KINDS, CERTI_NAME, CERTI_PLACE, ACCEPT, CERTI_DATE) VALUES (( SELECT NVL(MAX(CERTI_NO), 0) +1 FROM CERTIFICATE ), #{resume_no}, #{certi_kinds}, #{certi_name}, #{certi_place}, #{accept}, TO_DATE(#{certi_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
mapper.update: UPDATE CERTIFICATE SET CERTI_KINDS=#{certi_kinds}, CERTI_NAME=#{certi_name}, CERTI_PLACE=#{certi_place}, ACCEPT=#{accept}, CERTI_DATE=TO_DATE(#{certi_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE CERTI_NO=#{certi_no}
mapper.select: SELECT CERTI_NO, RESUME_NO, CERTI_KINDS, CERTI_NAME, CERTI_PLACE, ACCEPT, CERTI_DATE FROM CERTIFICATE WHERE RESUME_NO = #{resume_no}
